name: Wp-Faker
tagline: is a tool that allows to generate random dummy content for WordPress and Acf.
body: ## About WP Faker generates quickly a lot of content with random data. These data are generated using the [Faker](https://github.com/fzaninotto/Faker) library. The most interresting thing about it is that WP Faker is able to populate Acf fields. ## Usage ### Now you need to code...just a little bit To let the magic happen, you have to build a configuration file. Just rename or copy config-sample.php and start modifying it to suit your needs. Config files must respect this pattern : config-[name].php You can choose which post type to populate, set a title, content, featured images. If you stop it here, you already have a good foundation to generate blog posts. The most interresting part is the generation of contents for Acf fields. Each value is assign to the Acf field name as defined in your Acf groups. ### ...and get ready for the magic ! You're ready ! Browse to your /wp-faker directory and generate, generate, generate... Delightful ! ## Warning WP Faker usage doesn't suit a production environment and is still in beta version. ## Say hello Need help to build your WP Faker configuration file ? Enhancements to submit or bugs to report ? Send me a message through one of these channels, I would be pleased to hear from you. - [Issues tracker](https://github.com/alanpilloud/wp-faker/issues) - [@AlanPilloud](https://twitter.com/AlanPilloud) - [alanpilloud@gmail.com](mailto:alanpilloud@gmail.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
